contacts.subject: Complaint about delivery
contacts.message: My order was delivered 2 hours late and the food was cold. Please refund immediately!

contacts.subject: Feature request - Subscription meals
contacts.message: Would love to see a weekly meal subscription service. This would be very convenient!

contacts.subject: Partnership inquiry
contacts.message: I own a catering business and would like to partner with your platform.
contacts.response: Thank you for your interest. We will get in touch soon.

contacts.subject: Bug report - App crashes
contacts.message: The app crashes when I try to checkout with multiple items.
